hotels.name: Marriott Spartanburg
hotels.notes: Special Discount: 10% off for June 26–27 with code CAROLINE. Downtown full‑service stay with restaurants, seasonal pool, fitness center, complimentary WiFi, club lounge option, plus onsite wedding planning & catering services.

hotels.name: AC Hotel Downtown Spartanburg
hotels.notes: Stylish modern design just steps from Morgan Square. Amenities include free WiFi, outdoor pool, 24‑hour gym, onsite café/bar and three restaurants, plus pet‑friendly rooms.

hotels.name: Hilton Garden Inn Spartanburg
hotels.notes: Contemporary and welcoming with free WiFi, seasonal outdoor pool, fitness center, arcade/game room, onsite restaurant & bar, plus pet-friendly and free parking.

hotels.name: Four Points by Sheraton Spartanburg
hotels.notes: Reliable stay near I‑26/I‑85 with spacious rooms, large smart TVs, sound‑proof windows, indoor heated pool, gym, bar/restaurant, free WiFi and free parking—pet-friendly too.
